item.description:
6:00pm - 8:30pm

Opus Affair West is a free social group for all members of the arts community and those interested in all disciplines of the arts. There is no specific agenda or fee — just a chance to socialize over drinks, create connections within our region’s community of art-lovers.

Arrive alone, or bring along any friends who share an interest in the arts.

Free event, Cash Bar

Note: Individuals are responsible for running their own tabs at the bar
RSVP: totoole54@hotmail.com (helpful to our hosts, but not required) or
connect with us on Facebook

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Opus Affair West: Artists and Patrons of the Arts Socializing
